      • findPath

        private void findPath(int x,
                      int y,
                      int c)
        Recursive calculating of shortest way to target. Continue calculating if a shorter way was found. Unseeded tiles stay at Integer.MAX_VALUE.
        Parameters:
        x - x-Coordinate of tile
        y - y-Coordinate of tile
        c - Gone steps from start
